```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
library(lubridate)
library(ggsurvfit)
library(gtsummary)
library(tidycmprsk)

#Step 1- Loading in the Data
CancerData <- read_csv("../Data/CleanedData/CleanedData.csv")
glimpse(CancerData)
CancerData


cox_os_unadjusted <- coxph(
  Surv(Survival_Months, OS_status) ~ Delay_Group,
  data = CancerData
)

summary(cox_os_unadjusted)
```
